code: const artboard = new Artboard({ width: 400, height: 400, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5' }); const circle = new Circle({ radius: 100, style: { fill: '#3498db', stroke: '#2980b9', strokeWidth: 3 } }); circle.position({ relativeFrom: circle.center, relativeTo: artboard.contentBox.center, x: 0, y: 0 }); artboard.addElement(circle); artboard.render();
